heading: Paris-Never miss to visit
content: There are many attractions in Paris, so plan accordingly each day to cover up all attractions.Eiffel tower- Tickets are categorized as per some floor visits.so, buy accordingly. Some other attractions are below:Arc de triomphe,louvre museum, Versailles palace ,Disneyland ,Notre dame cathedral etc.,It was a beautiful trip!
name: Lucy

heading: Paris; the city of Romance and the Louvre
content: To me Paris is two things: romance and the Louvre. Romance seems to permeate the city. A walk along the Seine at night. A view of the Eiffel Tower. A view of the city from Sacr√© Coeur in Montmartre. Or nice romantic dinner in some small side street near Moulin Rouge. If you want to spend a romantic weekend with someone then Paris is the right place.
name: David

heading: Paris Trip: Money, Attractions, Shopping, Cleanliness!
content: What a place, the history, architecture and culture is wonderful. So many sites to see, one more amazing then the next. A must see if you are going to visit the great cities of the world.
name: Suzi

heading: Paris is a truly amazing city
content: What a place, the history, architecture and culture is wonderful. So many sites to see, one more amazing then the next. A must see if you are going to visit the great cities of the world.
name: Mike

heading: Dining in Paris
content: Nine days of dining in Paris has led me to believe that you 'can't' find a bad meal unless you prepared it.  Three meals a days in and around the 7eme left us breathless. Exceptional food and service, in and around the Rue Cler area amazed us in both brasseries and cafes There were just too many to name. Paris is the dining capitol of the world.
name: Karim
